headline: FedEx’s Fred Smith, Blackstone’s LePatner, and 4 Other Notables We Lost This Year
summary: Smith, founder and longstanding CEO of  FedEx  was the son of a successful businessman.  Smith, who twice declined Bush’s offer to make him Defense Secretary, played himself in Tom Hanks’ movie Cast Away.

headline: Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Price Target Trimmed by Analysts
summary: The share price of Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) fell by 1.55% between December 17 and December 24, 2025, putting it among the Energy Stocks that Lost the Most This Week. Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) is an independent exploration and production company with assets primarily in the United States, the Middle East, and North Africa. Occidental […]
